short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide the distracting metrics such as likes and views, and focus on the quality of the content instead.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
In the world of LinkedIn,
Likes and views are king,
But with a demetricator,
Quality can take the swing.

No longer will we judge,
By numbers on a screen,
But by the content's merit,
And what it truly means.

With each post that we see,
We'll focus on what's said,
And not the popularity,
Or how many views it's fed.

The demetricator helps us,
To see through the vanity,
And find the posts that truly matter,
With real value and humanity.
